rt

Class Material.ShadingSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.Material.ShadingSample
  • Enclosing interface:
    Material

    public static class Material.ShadingSample
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about a shading sample.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Spectrum brdf
      The BRDF value.
      Spectrum emission
      The emission value.
      boolean isSpecular
      Tells the integrator whether this is a specular sample.
      float p
      The (directional) probability density of the sample
      javax.vecmath.Vector3f w
      The sampled direction.

    • Field Detail

      • brdf

        public Spectrum brdf
        The BRDF value.

      • emission

        public Spectrum emission
        The emission value.

      • w

        public javax.vecmath.Vector3f w
        The sampled direction.

      • isSpecular

        public boolean isSpecular
        Tells the integrator whether this is a specular sample. In this case, a cosine factor in the specular BRDF should be omitted in the returned BRDF value, and the integrator should act accordingly.

      • p

        public float p
        The (directional) probability density of the sample
